title: sql-syntax error in while trashing (postgresql)
body:
### expected behaviour
no sql-syntax errors

### actual behaviour
sql-syntax error

### steps to reproduce
1. delete a file
2. wonder where it is in the bin
3. look at log

### server configuration
operating system:
opensuse
web server: 
nginx
database:
postgresql
php version:
5.3.22
owncloud version:
master
### client configuration
browser:
all
operating system:
all
### logs

#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
```
{"app":"hook","message":"error while running hook (oca\\files_trashbin\\hooks::remove_hook): sqlstate[42601]: syntax error: 7 fehler:  syntaxfehler bei \u00bbuser\u00ab\nline 1: ...o oc_files_trash (id,timestamp,location,type,mime,user) valu...\n                                                             ^","level":3,"time":1363296260}
{"app":"hook","message":"error while running hook (oca\\files_trashbin\\hooks::remove_hook): sqlstate[42601]: syntax error: 7 fehler:  syntaxfehler bei \u00bbuser\u00ab\nline 1: ...o oc_files_trash (id,timestamp,location,type,mime,user) valu...\n                                                             ^","level":3,"time":1363296352}
{"app":"hook","message":"error while running hook (oca\\files_trashbin\\hooks::remove_hook): sqlstate[42601]: syntax error: 7 fehler:  syntaxfehler bei \u00bbuser\u00ab\nline 1: ...o oc_files_trash (id,timestamp,location,type,mime,user) valu...\n                                                             ^","level":3,"time":1363296860}
{"app":"hook","message":"error while running hook (oca\\files_trashbin\\hooks::remove_hook): sqlstate[42601]: syntax error: 7 fehler:  syntaxfehler bei \u00bbuser\u00ab\nline 1: ...o oc_files_trash (id,timestamp,location,type,mime,user) valu...\n                                                             ^","level":3,"time":1363296984}
```

#### browser log
debug is on:
```
done after 0files
```

###### sidenote
the files are perfectly moved to the users trash directory, but not registeres in oc_files_trash.
